title: Reeves Acrylic Paint Set – 10 x 75ml Vibrant Primary Colour Tubes – Art Supplies for Adults Suitable for beginners, leisure and recreational users - Suitable for Multiple Surfaces
features: Enjoyable Acrylic Paint Set for Beginners: Designed for adults who want to unwind and relax with some easy painting and colouring, our acrylic paint sets are the perfect choice for you. Whether you’re new to acrylics or returning after a long break, our products are fuss-free and made for experiencing the simple joy of creating vibrant artworks.
10 Vibrant Colours: Packed with 10 vibrant acrylic paint tubes, the set contains all the essential colours you need. These 75ml tubes of acrylic paint help ensure you never run out while painting

Easy to use and quick to dry: Our acrylic paint sets are easy to use, quick to dry and work on most surfaces. Squeeze a little paint out from the acrylic paint tube and use it directly or dilute it with water and use it as you like. Our acrylic paints offer vibrant colours with a satin finish on application.

Surface guide & Inspiration: We want you to have a go and enjoy the journey as you develop your unique style of expression. Can be used on multiple surfaces like canvas, wood, glass and on acrylic paper pad for best results.
List of Colours: Titanium White, Medium Yellow, Brilliant Red, Grass Green, Ultramarine Blue, Phthalo Blue, Burnt Umber Brown, Mars Black

Trusted Since 1766: Since 1766, we have focused on creating products that offer good quality at a good price and supporting you in enjoying art in your own way. Just relax and have fun, we’ll do the hard work for you.

Our products are designed to ensure ease of use and quality across key art mediums: acrylic paints, watercolours, pastels, paper pads and more. We are a partner you can trust - we have been doing this for over 250 years and will continue to support and encourage individuality. There is no right or wrong in the world of reeves....
